sentences: In its decision ( FCCC/SBI/2009/L.21/Add.1 ), the COP, inter alia : calls upon parties that have not paid their contributions to the core budget to do so without delay; and reiterates its appreciation to the Government of Germany for its annual voluntary contribution to the core budget of â¬766,938 and its special contribution of â¬1,789,522 as host country for the Secretariat.
The COP, on continuing review of the functions and operations of the Secretariat, agrees that SBI 33 will consider this matter.
